100 painters of tomorrow

Posted on August 20, 2014

Selected to appear in new Thames and Hudson book, '100 painters of tomorrow'.

100 Painters of Tomorrow is the culmination of a new project, initiated by curator Kurt Beers and Thames & Hudson, to find the 100 most exciting painters at work today. This major publication introduces and presents the work from a global cast of painters selected by an international panel featuring some of the most prominent names in contemporary art. It features high-quality images of the rising starsâ€™ work, along with essential biographic information and quotations from the artists. 330 illustrations, 320 in colour.
